thread.title: Birthday Stay
thread.title_full: Birthday Stay - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Spencer D
title: Birthday Stay
text: I booked a room here to stay over for my Birthday. The staff was very polite, and when Informed It was my Birthday they wished me a 'Happy Birthday' and gave me some cookies. Later on a Birthday card with chocolates was sent to my room. Very impressed with the quality of stay, would definitely visit again.
